titleStmt.title: The seaven golden candlestickes Englands honour. The great mysterie of Gods mercie yet to come. With peace to the pure in heart aduising to vnitie among our selues. By Richard Bernard, minister at Batcombe in Somersetshire.
titleStmt.author: Bernard, Richard, 1568-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by William Stansby] for Iohn Badge, dwelling in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Greene Dragon,

notesStmt.note: Miscellaneous treatises, each with caption title.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Greene Dragon
